main event: Major William A. Burdick sighted a white spherical object in Madrid, Spain on August 22, 1955.
interesting points: The object was first assumed to be a weather balloon,The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute and 15 seconds,The object appeared silver in color and changed shape from a sphere to a disc as it moved,Major Burdick is an experienced pilot with around 4,000 flight hours,The sound of a jet aircraft was heard prior to the sighting which ceased as the object was observed.
witness description: USAF Major with extensive flying experience
